00010 #ifndef _ENVIRONMENTDEFS_H__
00011 #define _ENVIRONMENTDEFS_H__
00012 
00013 #include <cassert>
00014 #include <cstddef>
00015 
00016 /* This file provides useful definitions about the environment of project */
00017 
00019 // Compiler
00021 
00022 #if defined             (__GNUC__) || defined(__MINGW32__)
00023         #define COMPILER_GNUC           // GCC compiler
00024 
00025 #elif defined   (_MSC_VER)
00026         #define COMPILER_MSC            // Microsoft compiler
00027 
00028 #elif defined   (__ICL)
00029         #define COMPILER_INTEL          // Intel compiler
00030 
00031 #elif defined   (__CYGWIN__)
00032         #define COMPILER_CYGWIN         // CygWin compiler
00033 
00034 #elif defined   (__BORLANDC__)
00035         #define COMPILER_BORLAND        // Borland compiler
00036 
00037 #elif defined (__COMO__)
00038         #define COMPILER_COMEAU         // Comeau compiler
00039 
00040 #elif defined (__SUNPRO_CC)
00041         #define COMPILER_SUN            // Sun compiler
00042 
00043 #else
00044         #error Unknown comiler
00045 
00046 #endif
00047 
00049 // Compiler-specific
00051 
00052 #if defined (COMPILER_MSC)
00053     #define ALIGN_PROLOG(a) __declspec(align(a))
00054     #define ALIGN_EPILOG(a)
00055 #elif defined (COMPILER_GNUC)
00056     #define ALIGN_PROLOG(a)
00057     #define ALIGN_EPILOG(a) __attribute__((aligned(a)))
00058 #endif
00059 
00061 // OS
00063 
00064 #if defined     (WIN32) || defined (WIN64)
00065         #define OS_WINDOWS                      // Windows
00066 
00067 #elif defined(macintosh) || defined(__APPLE__) || defined(__APPLE_CC__)
00068         #define OS_MACOSX                       // Mac OS X
00069 
00070 #elif defined(linux) || defined(__linux) || defined(__linux__)
00071         #define OS_LINUX                        // Linux
00072 
00073 #else
00074         #error Unknown OS
00075 
00076 #endif
00077 
00079 // Standard library
00081 //#if defined(__SGI_STL_PORT) || defined(_STLPORT_VERSION)
00082 //      #define STDLIB_STLPORT                  // STLPort
00083 //#elif defined(__LIBCOMO__)
00084 //      #define STDLIB_COMEAU                   // Comeau STL
00085 //#elif defined(__GLIBCPP__) || defined(__GLIBCXX__)
00086 //      #  define STDLIB_GNU                    // GNU libstdc++ 3
00087 //#endif
00088 
00089 // No autodetection for now
00090 #if defined (COMPILER_MSC)
00091 #       define STDLIB_STLPORT
00092 #elif defined (COMPILER_GNUC)
00093 #       define STDLIB_GNU
00094 #endif
00095 
00096 
00098 // Processor architecture
00100 #if defined (OS_WINDOWS)
00101         #if defined(_M_X64)
00102                 #define PROCARCH_X86_64
00103         #elif defined(_M_IA64)
00104                 #define PROCARCH_IA64
00105         #elif defined(_M_IX86)
00106                 #define PROCARCH_X86
00107         #else
00108                 #error Unknown processor architecture
00109         #endif
00110 
00111 #elif defined (OS_LINUX)
00112         #if __x86_64__
00113                 #define PROCARCH_X86_64
00114         #elif __ia64__
00115                 #define PROCARCH_IA64
00116         #elif __i386__ || __i386
00117                 #define PROCARCH_X86
00118         #else
00119                 #error Unknown processor architecture
00120         #endif
00121 
00122 #elif defined (OS_MACOSX)
00123         #if __x86_64__
00124                 #define PROCARCH_X86_64
00125         #elif __ia64__
00126                 #define PROCARCH_IA64
00127         #elif __i386__ || __i386
00128                 #define PROCARCH_X86
00129         #else
00130                 #error Unknown processor architecture
00131 #endif
00132 
00133 #else
00134         #error Add means to determine architecture on other OSes
00135 
00136 #endif
00137 
00138 
00140 // Data model
00142 #if defined (PROCARCH_X86)
00143         #define DATAMODEL_ILP32         // sizeof( int, long, void* ) == 4
00144 
00145 #else
00146         #if defined (OS_WINDOWS)
00147                 #define DATAMODEL_LLP64 // sizeof( long long, void* ) == 8
00148 
00149         #elif defined (OS_LINUX)
00150                 #define DATAMODEL_LP64  // sizeof( long, long long, void* ) == 8
00151 
00152     #elif defined (OS_MACOSX)
00153                 #define DATAMODEL_LP64
00154 
00155         #else
00156                 #error Undefined data model
00157 
00158         #endif
00159 #endif
00160 
00161 
00163 // Instruction set
00165 #if defined (COMPILER_MSC) && !defined(__SSE__)
00166 
00167         #define __SSE__
00168         #define __SSE2__
00169 
00170 #endif
00171 
00173 // Shared libraries
00175 // see: http://gcc.gnu.org/wiki/Visibility
00177 #if defined OS_WINDOWS || defined COMPILER_CYGWIN
00178 #       define SHARED_IMPORT __declspec(dllimport)
00179 #       define SHARED_EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
00180 #       define SHARED_LOCAL
00181 #else
00182 #       if __GNUC__ >= 4
00183 #               define SHARED_IMPORT __attribute__ ((visibility("default")))
00184 #               define SHARED_EXPORT __attribute__ ((visibility("default")))
00185 #               define SHARED_LOCAL  __attribute__ ((visibility("hidden")))
00186 #       else
00187 #               define SHARED_IMPORT
00188 #               define SHARED_EXPORT
00189 #               define SHARED_LOCAL
00190 #       endif
00191 #endif
00192 
00193 #if defined OS_WINDOWS
00194 #   define SHARED_LIB_EXTENSION ".dll"
00195 #   define SHARED_LIB_PREFIX ""
00196 #elif defined OS_LINUX || defined OS_MACOSX
00197 #   define SHARED_LIB_EXTENSION ".so"
00198 #   define SHARED_LIB_PREFIX "lib"
00199 #else
00200 #   error Whats yours OS shared library extnsion?
00201 #endif
00202 
00203 #define SHARED_LIB_NAME(basename) SHARED_LIB_PREFIX basename SHARED_LIB_EXTENSION
00204 
00206 // Debugging
00208 
00209 // This assertion will cause debug versions to crash if parameter is false
00210 #define ASSERT_STRICT(x) assert(x)
00211 
00212 // This type of assertions is used when some error appear that can be
00213 // properly processed by the engine, so it is possible to safely remove it in
00214 // most of build types
00215 #define ASSERT_SOFT(x) assert(x)
00216 
00217 #define NOT_IMPLEMENTED() assert(false); throw __FUNCTION__;
00218 
00219 #endif // _ENVIRONMENTDEFS_H__
